MCP Quest

What if learning the Model Context Protocol felt like playing Pokémon Emerald?

  • 240×160 GBA-native resolution
  • Canvas only — no frameworks
  • NPC-driven explanations of MCP concepts

Docs are fine. Worlds are better.
